entry.title: How a High-Value Russian Wanted by the U.S. Escaped From Italy
entry.content: Artem Uss was able to escape after he was granted house arrest near Milan, despite U.S. warnings that he would flee. The affair has robbed the U.S. of a potentially valuable asset in prisoner exchanges for Americans held in Russia.

entry.title: Drones Hit Russian Oil Refineries as Moscow Shores Up Front Line
entry.content: Such attacks come as Russia loses the initiative in the conflict, say Western officials, with Moscow increasingly reacting to Ukrainian offensives that are setting the agenda on the battlefield.

entry.title: The Next Wave of Mass Environmental Litigation Bubbles Up From Coastal Florida
entry.content: Compounds used in firefighting foam seeped into the groundwater in the town of Stuart. Now it’s at the forefront of thousands of suits against chemical companies.
